## Bluprint example

```{r}
library(reticulate)
use_python(here::here(".venv/bin/python"))

bluprint_conf <- import("bluprint_conf")
data <- bluprint_conf$load_data_yaml()

data
```

```{r}
df <- read.table(data["example"], sep = ",", header = TRUE)
df
```
